name: CBA Easy Embed
author: Thomas Diesenreiter and Ingo Leindecker

sections.description: Makes it easier to embed content from the Cultural Broadcasting Archive (http://cba.fro.at). Paste in a link to a single entry like http://cba.fro.at/112836, and the plugin will get the default embed code for you. Uses the oembed technology.
sections.installation: 1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory 2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress 3. Your done. Happy embedding!
sections.faq: If anything is unclear, please contact us via http://cba.fro.at

short_description: Makes it easier to embed content from the Cultural Broadcasting Archive (http://cba.fro.at). Paste in a link to a single entry like http://cba.fro.
